column1: Art Institute of Chicago////American Gothic is good for sure.  Ah American Gothic.  An old farmer and his spinster daughter. How wonderful!  Living off the land and sad.  Apparently
column2: Grant Wood won the bronze prize and $300 in a contest at the Art Institute for this painting.  When the painting became more famous
column3: Iowans protested because they felt mocked. They considered it a caricature and a disrespectful of their lifestyle.  Ha! Suck it Iowans.  People still think you're losers.
